propertiesMeta.name: manualValue
propertiesMeta.description: Manual value of the light zone. (Default: fSetValMan_In, DataType: number)

propertiesMeta.name: writeManualValue
propertiesMeta.description: Write the manual value to the lights of the zone. (Default: bSetValMan_In, DataType: boolean)

propertiesMeta.name: controlModeActive
propertiesMeta.description: Defines if the control mode is active or inactive. (Default: bCtrlMod_Out, DataType: boolean)

propertiesMeta.name: activateControlMode
propertiesMeta.description: Set to true to activate the alarm mode. (Default: bSetCtrlMod_In, DataType: boolean)

propertiesMeta.name: activationMode
propertiesMeta.description: Activation mode of the light zone. (Default: eLightActivationMode_In, DataType: intger)
